text: Tor Åge Bringsværd (born 16 November 1939 in Skien) Biography is an Norwegian author, playwright, editor and translator. He is perhaps best known for his speculative fiction. Together with Jon Bing, he is also considered the first Norwegian author to write science fiction books. He and Bing have been partners for a long time. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian writers Category:Norwegian playwrights Category:European translators
title: Tor Åge Bringsværd
